Characteristic.name: Unread Alert Status

InformativeText.Abstract: This characteristic shows how many numbers of unread alerts exist in the specific category in the device.
InformativeText.Summary: This characteristic consists of "Category ID" and "uint8" which shows the number of unread alerts/messages.

Examples.Example: The value 0x01, 0x04 are interpreted that the server has 4 unread messages in Email category.

Field.name: Category ID
Field.InformativeText: The value shows the category for unread alert count

Field.name: Unread count
Field.InformativeText: How many unread alerts exist on the server. If the value is 255, it means Unread count is greater than 254.

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
